deeprules.survival.mixed

Contains classes for induction of mixed DNF and CNF survival rules.

Submodules

  • deeprules.survival.mixed._helpers
  • deeprules.survival.mixed._induction
  • deeprules.survival.mixed._model
  • deeprules.survival.mixed._params

Classes

Survival

Survival rules based on Rules algorithm.
